active.name: active
active.description:
Set the active step (zero based index).

Set to -1 to disable all the steps.

completed.name: completed
completed.description:
Set the completed steps (zero based index).

**Number of completed steps <= completed index**

steps.name: steps
steps.description:
StepProp {
  label: string;
  value?: React.ReactText;
}

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| label | Describes Label of the step |
| value | Value of option |

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description: Callback function called when user clicks on a non-disabled step.

type.name: function
type.value: ((active: number, completed: number, label?: string | undefined, value?: string | number | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((active: number, completed: number, label?: string | undefined, value?: string | number | undefined) => void) | undefined

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.
